pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, October 21, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a health care facility. He will be joined by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will hold a media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event can email media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for further details.
